#text=Then , I filled the bathtub with warm water .
#text=I poured some bubble bath mixture into the tub while the bath was filling so that my bath would have bubbles .
#text=When the bath was full , I turned off the water and climbed into the warm tub .
#text=I felt very relaxed as I lay in the warm bubble bath .
#text=I shut my eyes for a moment to enjoy the sensation .
#text=I then washed my hair , lathering the shampoo into my hair , then rinsing it off in the bath water .
#text=Next , I washed my whole body with a bar of soap .
#text=When I was completely clean , I stepped out of the bath and wrapped a towel around myself .
#text=I wrapped a second towel around my hair to keep it from dripping everywhere .
#text=I then unplugged the bath drain to let the water drain out of the tub .
